about_the_game:
Repair, service and build bikes. Become a bicycle mechanic and make your workshop a real empire on two wheels. Show off your precision and put equipment to a test. From city bikes to high-performance road and MTB models. It's time for cycling madness! Bike Mechanic Simulator is a true-to-life simulator where you can take on the role of a bicycle mechanic, perform a whole variety of orders, and expand your own workshop. Become a bicycle mechanic - maintain, repair, and service bikes and put them to a test. From old vintage models and simple city bikes to ultramodern designs for high-performance athletes and bicycle fanatics.

Repair and build bikes



Each bike that goes to your workshop consists of several dozen different components. What it needs is a detailed review and troubleshooting. Double-check individual parts to find the right solution. And then - depending on the situation - disassemble, assemble, adjust, clean and repair all you like! Get creative and help your customers build their unique bikes from scratch. There are no two orders alike. Some bet on style, some count on performance, and others appreciate the quality/price ratio. Choose the optimal components and show off your design powers.

Create a workshop powerhouse



Your career begins in a simple workshop equipped with all the essentials. But this is just the beginning. Thanks to progress, you will gain new skills and money to improve and expand your workplace. Invest in new technologies, boost your work efficiency, and arrange the space in the workshop as you desire. But don't forget about other things while you're at it! There are times when a prestigious workshop might need some cleaning, and bicycle parts aren't going to order themselves either!

Put equipment to a test



The equipment must be checked. After repairing or assembling a two-wheeler, it is worth testing if everything is working as it should. Double-check the condition, performance and reliability of the bikes. Remember that customer satisfaction depends on it. Test drive mode will also allow you to spot various hidden faults that you might have missed during the inspection.

Cycling madness



You’ll come across a whole lot of different cycling equipment. City, mountain (MTB) and road bikes are just the main variants in this category. The cycling world is full of diversity. Wheels in various sizes, countless types of drives and shock absorbers, frames made from different materials, one-of-a-kind technologies and plenty of other elements. All just waiting to be discovered ...

Main features of the game:

- many types of bicycles and components;
- high level of realism;
- servicing, repair and assembly of bicycles;
- each bike consists of several dozen different parts;
- over a dozen types of tools and repair stations;
- various orders;
- workshop extension and improvement;
- different game modes (story mode and sandbox);
- collecting bicycles;
- cycling madness.
